GSD.description:
ovl: Use "buf" flexible array for memcpy() destination

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit 07a96977b2f462337a9121302de64277b8747ab1. For more details please see the references link.
